resource.title: Options Trading Secrets | Top 4 Secrets of SUCCESSFUL Options Traders
resource.author: Scott Bauer, CEO Prosper Trading Academy

reason: Fills documented gap in trading psychology lessons. FOMO prevention and professional losing concepts were not covered in existing RAG.

already_doing: Stop-loss mechanics (but NOT the 'professional losing' mindset)

action_items: Consider adding FOMO check to pre-trade verification script

key_takeaways.secret_1: Find individual trading style - we use credit spreads, stick to it
key_takeaways.secret_2: Professional losing - exit objectively, no hope/pray
key_takeaways.secret_3: Trading as business - structured hours (9:35 AM)
key_takeaways.secret_4: Eliminate FOMO - always another trade, 100% conviction only
